name: EventRoleReadd
short: Automatically re-adds event roles based on log messages
description: Monitors a designated log channel for event signup messages and automatically re-adds event roles to users based on configurable keywords.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any end user data.
install_msg: Thank you for installing EventRoleReadd! Use `[p]rolereadd settings` to configure the cog.
author: Claude
